name: Horace in the Mega Vault
description:
Trapped inside the Mega Vault, Horace must rush to feed his father Herbert and find the key to escape!

Horace in the Mega Vault is an adaptation of the Vic 20 game Mega Vault by Imagine. Remade with a ZX Spectrum theme and now with 7 fiendish vaults to navigate, it's a classic game of dodge and collect. Are you up to the challenge?

HOW TO PLAY
Collect all the flowers, get the key and open the vault before time runs out!

CONTROLS
Arrow keys to move and space to start. ALT + ENTER for full screen. ESC to quit.

CREDITS
By Paul Weller. Original content (c) Sunteam 2017
Mega Vault was released by Imagine Software on the VIC 20
Horace Psion/Beam Software/William Tang/Sinclair Research/Melbourne House

www.sunteam.co.uk
